speaker: MUNTZ
line: A lot of consideration...yeah a lot...don't think you're not expendable, no...he never once said I was doing a good job...all my hard work...nobody ever stuck up for me...they were all treated special Nobody moves! Everybody stays! Shut up! I said shut up! Now you listen to me...everyone listen to me...ok the children can go Everybody else, nobody move...I said nobody else move

speaker: SMITH
line: Please don't harm anyone.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: Stay away, or I'll shoot.

speaker: SMITH
line: You're frightening these people.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: I'll do it! Hey! I will do it.

speaker: SMITH
line: They've done nothing to you.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: Oh you don't know.

speaker: SMITH
line: Give me the gun.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: I am not a loser.

speaker: SMITH
line: No you're not.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: They made me do it. They made me.

speaker: SMITH
line: But you're not going to do it. You're gonna show them. You're gonna show them.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: No! I'm gonna die

speaker: SMITH
line: Nobody's going to die.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where are the wounded?

speaker: PARAMEDIC
line: What?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm FBI, where are the people who were shot?

speaker: PARAMEDIC
line: Everybody's inside, but you're not gonna find anybody who's wounded.

speaker: MULDER
line: You're the 1st medic on the scene?

speaker: PARAMEDIC
line: Yes sir.

speaker: MULDER
line: Can you tell me what happened?

speaker: PARAMEDIC
line: Well it doesn't make any sense. We got a call, there had been a shooting, at least one man was down, but when we got here there wasn't a damn thing to do.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Excuse me, I'm Special Agent Scully, FBI. I wanna talk to somebody who can tell me what happened.

speaker: DETECTIVE
line: Well I can tell you what I saw but I don't think there's a man here who can tell you what happened.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What did you see?

speaker: DETECTIVE
line: Maybe you should talk to this man, he was one of the one shot.

speaker: SCULLY
line: You were shot?

speaker: MAN
line: Right here, right in the stomach. I felt the bullet enter me, and the next thing I remembered was being on the floor, my legs and arms were numb and I could taste blood in my throat then I see the man's face.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What man?

speaker: MAN
line: The same guy who tried to talk the gun guy out of hurting anyone.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What did he do?

speaker: MAN
line: He touched me, and he said I was gonna be ok. And then all of the sudden, I could feel my legs and arms again.

speaker: MUNTZ
line: Who are you?

speaker: MULDER
line: My name is Fox Mulder, I'm an FBI Agent. I understand you've been read your rights will you talk to me Mr Muntz? Can you tell me what happened?

speaker: MUNTZ
line: God.. spared my life today. He took pity on my soul and he washed away my sins.

speaker: MULDER
line: How do you mean?

speaker: MUNTZ
line: He reached down and he healed me with his hand. A man, a holy man. All I can think is.. it must have been the good Lord himself

speaker: MULDER
line: Talked to him?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who?

speaker: MULDER
line: The shooter described a man, a man who reached down and healed with the palm of his hand.

speaker: SCULLY
line: He's gone.

speaker: MULDER
line: They let him leave the scene?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well nobody let him leave, he was in custody, and they were talking to him and then somehow he just disappeared.

speaker: MULDER
line: He's vanished?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Without a trace.

speaker: CSM
line: It struck me as I was sitting here.

speaker: MRS. MULDER
line: What?

speaker: CSM
line: Everything changes but the sea.

speaker: MRS. MULDER
line: What do you want from me?

speaker: CSM
line: I thought we might at least allow ourselves to reminisce.

speaker: MRS. MULDER
line: I have nothing to say to you.

speaker: CSM
line: Really? We used to have so much to say to each other, so many good times at the Mulder's summer place . Your kids.. young and energetic. I remember water-skiing down there with Bill. He was a good water-skier your husband, not as good as I was but then that could be said about so many things... couldn't it?

speaker: MRS. MULDER
line: I've repressed it all.

speaker: CSM
line: Well, I find that hard to believe, particularly since I came here today to ask you to remember something. Something I'm gonna have to ask you to try very hard to recollect.

speaker: DETECTIVE
line: He gave a name as Jeremiah Smith, of Suitland, Virginia, he gave a PO box that turned out to be phony, he had no driver's license.

speaker: MULDER
line: All the cars in the parking lot have been accounted for?

speaker: DETECTIVE
line: Which means he must have walked from somewhere nearby. We've got a canvass out.

speaker: SCULLY
line: And you talked to him personally?

speaker: DETECTIVE
line: Yeah, damnedest thing, and I swear this is how it happened, I looked down to my notebook to write something, I look up, the guy's not standing there anymore. It's like he just disappeared.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mulder.

speaker: WOMAN'S VOICE
line: Agent Mulder, this is Assistant Director Skinner's office, would you hold for a moment?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder, we've just received a call here that might cause you some alarm.

speaker: MULDER
line: What is it?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Your mother has been admitted in a hospital in serious condition, a small coastal town on Rhode Island called.. Quono..

speaker: MULDER
line: Quonochautaug? I'm on my way.

speaker: SCULLY
line: The nurse said she had a stroke. They don't know yet the nature of severity, but the doctor's on his way down.

speaker: MULDER
line: She's cold.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder I don't wanna jump to conclusions. I don't want you to think the worst, people recover from those situations all the time.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mom..

speaker: NURSE
line: She hasn't been able to speak, she's been in and out of consciousness.

speaker: MULDER
line: How did she get here?

speaker: NURSE
line: A 911 came in, the paramedics from Shelter Harbor found her on the floor of the house.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mom. Hi. It's ok, everything's gonna be ok. What what is it? What do you want?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I think she wants something to write on.

speaker: MULDER
line: Palm?

speaker: SCULLY
line: She's had what's called a subarachnoid hemorrhage, but they're very hopeful because the circulation was restored so quickly. She's gonna be under constant supervision at the Best Care up in Providence. It could be a lot worse.

speaker: MULDER
line: Thanks.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you ok?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yeah. I'm.. I just can't help thinking there's a correlation.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Correlation?

speaker: MULDER
line: A connection to the shooting at the fast food restaurant.

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm sorry, I.. I don't understand.

speaker: MULDER
line: My mother wrote the word palm, that's what the man who healed the victim, that's what he used, the palm of his hand. You..you think it's a leap?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, there's no deep mystery here. Your mother is at the.. the right age for something like this to happen.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why the word palm?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Well there could be several reasons huh..but to be honest, I don't think it means anything, her brain and her thought processes have been.. have been radically changed by what's happened. It could have very well affected her center of speech, her language.

speaker: MULDER
line: But you can't explain it exactly, nor can it be explained how the wounded were miraculously healed or how the man who healed them just vanished into the air, can it?

speaker: SCULLY
line: I'm sure it can, and will be Mulder, I'm gonna drive you to the nearest motel, it's been a very long day.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm gonna go back to D.C..

speaker: SCULLY
line: To do what?

speaker: MULDER
line: I wanna find out who this miracle man is.

speaker: MULDER
line: This is everything shot by the 1st news crews at the scene. Outtakes and unedited footage.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Did they get anything on the man on question?

speaker: MULDER
line: Yes it's supposed to be about 8:22 There, that must be him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Whoa what happened there?

speaker: MULDER
line: Hey he's gone.Where did he go? You see that?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah..

speaker: MULDER
line: Looks like he's gone but there's..somebody else in his place, wearing the same clothes.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Could that be another detective?

speaker: MULDER
line: Why don't you find out ?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where are you going?

speaker: MULDER
line: If I told you, you'd never let me go.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder you haven't slept in almost 24 hours.

speaker: MULDER
line: Call me if you find anything .

speaker: X
line: He was here with her.

speaker: MULDER
line: What?

speaker: X
line: With your mother, the Cancer Man.

speaker: MULDER
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: X
line: Maybe I can bring you up to speed Agent Mulder

speaker: MULDER
line: Did you take this?

speaker: X
line: They had quite an argument, as you might gather from the snapshots. You seemed surprised. I'm sure you were aware they knew each other or what brought them here together?

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't know. Did he hurt her?

speaker: X
line: No, no she collapsed after he left. I dare say if I hadn't been there to make the call, she might not have survived.

speaker: MULDER
line: What did they argue about?

speaker: X
line: I don't know, I was forced to keep a discreet distance.

speaker: MULDER
line: You must have some idea or else you wouldn't have followed them here.

speaker: X
line: He wants something from her, something she may have kept in this house unless you know another reason they would have chosen to meet here.

speaker: MULDER
line: On the day my parents divorced, my mother vowed never to set foot in the summer house again, I know my mother, she kept her word.

speaker: X
line: It could be something very old, certainly, something very important.

speaker: MULDER
line: I have no idea what that could be.

speaker: X
line: No idea at all?

speaker: MULDER
line: No.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Sir? Excuse me but..

speaker: SMITH
line: Yes?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Are you Jeremiah Smith?

speaker: SMITH
line: Yes, I'm afraid there's been some mistake, I saw my photo on the news saying I fled a scene of a crime, I'm here to turn myself in.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Huh, would you come with me sir.

speaker: SMITH
line: From the moment I stepped from the crowd and asked the man to put down his gun, it seemed like .. a dream, as if I was out of my body.

speaker: SCULLY
line: There were reports, somewhat fantastic reports about what happened next.

speaker: SMITH
line: I know, I saw the news reports. I'll have to say that I don't remember any of it, nothing.

speaker: DETECTIVE
line: You gave me a wrong address sir, then you left the crime scene during the interview

speaker: SMITH
line: I don't remember that, I'm sorry.

speaker: SKINNER
line: What *do* you remember, Mr Smith?

speaker: SMITH
line: I remember showing up for work at the next day, being at my desk. That's my 1st recollection.

speaker: SKINNER
line: At the Social Security Administration?

speaker: SCULLY
line: You haven't done anything wrong, sir

speaker: SMITH
line: May I go?

speaker: SKINNER
line: Yes, but until this matter is resolved completely, I'll ask you to notify us if you'll be outta town for any reasons

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Scully?

speaker: CSM
line: This becomes a responsibility. The thing I am now called upon to put right and put down. Certainly you expected nothing less.

speaker: SMITH
line: I'm not ashamed of my actions.

speaker: CSM
line: Ashamed? You're not allowed the luxury of human weakness in penitence. You're not allowed to put your indulgences ahead of the greater purpose.

speaker: SMITH
line: I no longer believe in the greater purpose.

speaker: CSM
line: Then your fate is just.

speaker: SMITH
line: My justice is not for you to mete out. You may have reasons, you have no right, you have no means.

speaker: CSM
line: You presume to dictate duty to *me*? Have you any idea what the cost of your action is? What their affect might be? Who are you to give them hope?

speaker: SMITH
line: What do you give them?

speaker: CSM
line: We give them happiness, and they give us authority.

speaker: SMITH
line: The authority to take away their freedom in the guise of democracy.

speaker: CSM
line: Men can never be free, because they're weak, corrupt, worthless and restless. The people believe in authority, they've grown tired of waiting for miracle or mystery. Science is their religion, no greater explanation exists for them. They must never believe any differently if the project is to go forward.

speaker: SMITH
line: At what cost to them?

speaker: CSM
line: The question is irrelevant, and the outcome inevitable, the date is set. SMITH

speaker: SMITH
line: By whom this time, and by what tool?

speaker: CSM
line: By those who possess the tool of your destruction.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Excuse me?

speaker: MULDER
line: I want the smoking man smoked out, I want him exposed as the murdering son of a bitch that he is.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where have you been?

speaker: MULDER
line: To our summer house, he was there with my mother. He's the reason for what happened to her.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Where did you get these?

speaker: MULDER
line: It *doesn't* matter where I got those, the only thing that matters is that *that* man is called to answer, now I want his name!

speaker: SKINNER
line: I don't know his name.

speaker: MULDER
line: You know how to get it.

speaker: SKINNER
line: These men don't have names.

speaker: MULDER
line: Well then you tell me how to find him.

speaker: SKINNER
line: Agent Mulder, there was a time when I might have been able to tell you, but that time is passed.

speaker: MULDER
line: He knows about the man who disappeared from the restaurant shooting.

speaker: SCULLY
line: What are you talking about?

speaker: MULDER
line: He's trying to kill him.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder he just came in yesterday, he just turned himself in.

speaker: MULDER
line: What?

speaker: SCULLY
line: He.. he gave a statement.

speaker: MULDER
line: Where is he now?

speaker: SCULLY
line: He works for the social security administration.

speaker: MULDER
line: Mr Smith?

speaker: SMITH
line: Hello.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm with the FBI. I'd like you to come with me

speaker: SMITH
line: For what? I told you everything I know. I thought they said you'd call if there was anything.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm sure you don't want to cause a scene at work, sir.

speaker: SMITH
line: No of course not I'll come along.

speaker: SMITH
line: Where are you taking me? Can you tell me where you're taking me?

speaker: MULDER
line: We'll have plenty of time to talk sir.

speaker: MULDER
line: You see him?

speaker: SCULLY
line: No I lost him.

speaker: CSM
line: It's only a matter of time now.

speaker: SMITH
line: You put me in a cage, within a cage, why are you so afraid of me?

speaker: CSM
line: I'm not.

speaker: SMITH
line: Yes you are, you *live* in your fear, that's your whole life.

speaker: CSM
line: You don't know anything about me.

speaker: SMITH
line: I know everything about you. You think the miracles I perform.. are the extent of my power.

speaker: CSM
line: You think you're god. You're a drone, a cataloger, chattel!

speaker: SMITH
line: What you're afraid of is.. *they'll* believe I'm God.

speaker: CSM
line: It doesn't matter, most of them have ceased to believe in God.

speaker: SMITH
line: Why?

speaker: CSM
line: Because God presents them with no miracles to earn their faith.

speaker: SMITH
line: You think when men ceases to believe in miracles, he rejects God?

speaker: CSM
line: Of course.

speaker: SMITH
line: You rule over them in God's name.

speaker: CSM
line: They don't believe in him but they still fear him. They're afraid not to because they're afraid of freedom.

speaker: SMITH
line: And you give them happiness.

speaker: CSM
line: We appease their conscience, anyone who can appease a man's conscience can take his freedom away from him. their conscience, you kill 'em but you can't kill em all. You can't kill their love, which is what makes them who they are, makes them better than us, better than you.

speaker: CSM
line: You talk, I'm not one of you.

speaker: SMITH
line: No. All you want is to be part of it, is to be one of the commandants, when the process begins. But you are wrong.

speaker: CSM
line: Oh, am I?

speaker: SMITH
line: Yes, you are dying of lung cancer.

speaker: CSM
line: It's a lie.

speaker: SMITH
line: You think it's a lie?

speaker: CSM
line: You wanna save your life.

speaker: SMITH
line: And you?

speaker: DOCTOR
line: We have been helpful but there was susbstancial blood loss during the stroke event, which has put a lot of pressure on the brain.

speaker: MULDER
line: Will she regain consciousness?

speaker: DOCTOR
line: I know it's hard, but she may not. I can be paged if you need me.

speaker: MULDER
line: Thank you.

speaker: MULDER
line: You wanna smoke that, or do you wanna smoke on this?

speaker: CSM
line: Are you giving me a choice?

speaker: MULDER
line: I should shoot you right here, but they probably would be able to save you.

speaker: CSM
line: Do it, do it Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: Or maybe shoot a bullet through your brain so you'd be bedridden on a bed for the rest of your life.

speaker: CSM
line: How is she?

speaker: MULDER
line: What do you care?

speaker: CSM
line: I've known your mother since before you were born, Fox.

speaker: MULDER
line: I don't care.

speaker: CSM
line: I've gone to see her recently.

speaker: MULDER
line: And I know what you are looking for.

speaker: CSM
line: I wasn't looking for anything. It's what she was looking for actually. She contacted me.

speaker: MULDER
line: Liar!

speaker: CSM
line: I had information, possibly..on the whereabouts of your sister.

speaker: MULDER
line: Where is she? Where is she?

speaker: CSM
line: It seems the..the man who has the information has disappeared.

speaker: MULDER
line: I have what you want.

speaker: CSM
line: There's nothing I want Agent Mulder, except to see how your mother's doing.

speaker: MULDER
line: Yes.

speaker: X
line: Give it to me.

speaker: MULDER
line: I can't do that.

speaker: X
line: It's of no value to you.

speaker: MULDER
line: And to you?

speaker: X
line: When the time comes, when the truth is finally determined, its value will soar.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why?

speaker: X
line: I think you know why Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: It's a weapon, isn't it? Used to pierce the back of a neck. It's the only way we can kill them.

speaker: X
line: A simple gunshot won't do.

speaker: MULDER
line: Why do you want it ?

speaker: X
line: They will kill you for it Agent Mulder, that's a fact. They'll stop at nothing for it, nothing. If they have to martyr you at risk of turning your work into a crusade.

speaker: MULDER
line: Let me get clear on something here, what we're talking about is colonization. The date is set, isn't it?

speaker: X
line: Give me the weapon Agent Mulder.

speaker: MULDER
line: No. X punches mulder and they get into a fist fight, pretty nasty, Mulder bleeds, they finally both reach for their guns and are holding each other at gun point]

speaker: MULDER
line: You shoot me and you'll never find it.

speaker: X
line: I oughtta shoot you anyway after everything I've given you.

speaker: MULDER
line: I'm walking, away.

speaker: X
line: You're a dead man Agent Mulder. One way, or the other.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who is it?

speaker: SMITH
line: Jeremiah Smith. Please let me in. SCULLY I want you to put your hands up where I can see them. Ok, I want you to keep your hands up, I'm gonna unlock the door. I want you to count to 5, come in, close the door and lock it behind you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Keep your hands up please.

speaker: SMITH
line: I have important information for you, something your partner has been seeking. It concerns an elaborate plan, a project, and his sister.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Why didn't you tell me before?

speaker: SMITH
line: I've never spoken to you before, the man you spoke to was an impostor, he was sent here to kill me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Who are you?

speaker: SMITH
line: I'll explain everything.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Yeah.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully it's me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder where are you?

speaker: MULDER
line: I've been up with my mother, listen to me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder listen to me, there's somebody here, somebody you need to talk to.

speaker: MULDER
line: Who?

speaker: SCULLY
line: Jeremiah Smith.

speaker: MULDER
line: Alright Scully, you gotta get out of your apartment, they're gonna be looking for him, I want you to meet me.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Where?

speaker: MULDER
line: Off the I-95, uh Bond Mill Road.

speaker: MULDER
line: Scully! Scully move away from him, come stand behind me.

speaker: SMITH
line: I've come to you at great risk, I mean you no harm. I have a long and complicated story to tell you.

speaker: SCULLY
line: Mulder, he knows about your sister.

speaker: MULDER
line: How do I know you're for real?

speaker: SMITH
line: I was at that restaurant, I healed those people.

speaker: SCULLY
line: But how?

speaker: SMITH
line: I can explain everything to you.

speaker: MULDER
line: First I want you to come somewhere with me. I want you to come with me to see my mother.

speaker: SMITH
line: He's here to kill me.
